tool_description: 🪄 Provides easy&fast access to text2image / image2image / inpainting AI. (57 models across Stable Diffusion 1.x/2.x and finetuned models)
title: Dezgo

api_list.name: /upscale
api_list.description:
Upscale an image by a factor of 2
This AI attempts to preserve contrasted edges and details as much as possible, producing a sharper image than simple interpolation methods. The result is returned as "image/png".

The following parameters influence the request cost: `image`
(see the "About" section for more details)

parameters.name: image
parameters.description:
The image to upscale

**Constraints:**
- Image size: `8 - 2048` pixels on either side (auto-resized)

utterances.utterance: Can you enhance this photo by doubling its resolution while keeping the edges sharp?
Please upscale this image to twice its original size with clear details preserved.
I want to improve the quality of this picture by increasing its dimensions by a factor of two.
Could you make this image larger, doubling its pixel count while maintaining sharpness?
Please double the size of this image and keep the edges and details crisp.
Upscale this graphic by 2x, ensuring the details remain well-defined.
Increase the resolution of this photo twofold, preserving the contrast and sharpness.
Make this image twice as large with enhanced edge clarity.
Can you enlarge this picture by a factor of two while keeping the details intact?
Please upscale this image to double its size, focusing on preserving sharp edges.

api_list.name: /image2image
api_list.description:
Edit an existing image to fit a given text description


The following parameters influence the request cost: `init_image`, `steps`, `upscale`
(see the "About" section for more details)

License: CreativeML Open RAIL-M (https://dezgo.com/license.txt)

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description:
Describe how the final image should look like

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: an astronaut riding a horse, digital art, epic lighting, highly-detailed masterpiece trending HQ

parameters.name: init_image
parameters.description:
Upload the original image to be modified.
Supports PNG/JPEG files, up to a maximum of 1024x1024. Dimensions should be divisible by 8. The image is resized automatically if necessary.

**Constraints:**
- Image size: `8 - 1024` pixels on either side (auto-resized)

parameters.name: upscale
parameters.description:
Upscale the image by this factor using the Real-ESRGAN model. Currently only a factor of 2 is supported.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `1 - 2`

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description:
Unique image seed number. If not provided, the image will be random.
An unsigned 32-bit integer seed used to control the generator randomness.
Reusing the same seed with the same parameters will produce the same image.
Reusing the same seed with slightly different parameters tends to produce variations of the same composition ;
you can use this to experiment with the impact of different parameters.

If you instructed the API to choose a random seed, it can be retrieved from the response header `x-input-seed`

**Constraints:**
- Range: `0 - 4294967295`

parameters.name: steps
parameters.description:
Number of sampling steps. More steps = more details but also longer computation time.
More steps may improve quality under some circumstances and refine details, but it will take longer and be more expensive.
Fewer will result in lower quality images but is quicker and cheaper to process.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `10 - 150`

parameters.name: sampler
parameters.description:
Defines the sampling method used to generate the image.
The best samplers for low step counts tend to be `dpm`, `euler` and `euler_a`.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `ddim`
  - `dpm`
  - `euler`
  - `euler_a`
  - `k_lms`
  - `pndm`
parameters.default: euler_a

parameters.name: negative_prompt
parameters.description:
Describe what you DON'T want in the generated image

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: ugly, tiling, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn feet, poorly drawn face, out of frame, extra limbs, disfigured, deformed, body out of frame, blurry, bad anatomy, blurred, watermark, grainy, signature, cut off, draft

parameters.name: model
parameters.description:
The AI used to generate the image.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `abyss_orange_mix_2`
  - `analog_diffusion`
  - `anything_3_0`
  - `anything_4_0`
  - `basil_mix`
  - `blood_orange_mix`
  - `deliberate`
  - `dh_classicanime`
  - `disco_diffusion_style`
  - `double_exposure_diffusion`
  - `dreamshaper`
  - `duchaiten_anime`
  - `duchaiten_darkside`
  - `duchaiten_dreamworld`
  - `eimis_anime_diffusion_1`
  - `ely_orange_mix`
  - `emoji_diffusion`
  - `epic_diffusion_1`
  - `epic_diffusion_1_1`
  - `foto_assisted_diffusion`
  - `future_diffusion`
  - `hasdx`
  - `iconsmi_appiconsmodelforsd`
  - `inkpunk_diffusion`
  - `lowpoly_world`
  - `openjourney`
  - `openjourney_2`
  - `openniji`
  - `paint_journey_2_768px`
  - `papercut`
  - `pastel_mix`
  - `portrait_plus`
  - `realistic_vision_1_3`
  - `redshift_diffusion`
  - `redshift_diffusion_768px`
  - `something_2`
  - `stable_diffusion_fluidart`
  - `stable_diffusion_papercut`
  - `stable_diffusion_voxelart`
  - `stablediffusion_1_4`
  - `stablediffusion_1_5`
  - `stablediffusion_2_0_512px`
  - `stablediffusion_2_0_768px`
  - `stablediffusion_2_1_512px`
  - `stablediffusion_2_1_768px`
  - `steampunk_diffusion`
  - `synthwavepunk_v2`
  - `texture_diffusion`
  - `trinart_2_0`
  - `tshirt_diffusion`
  - `vectorartz_diffusion`
  - `vintedois_diffusion_v0_1`
  - `vox_2`
  - `waifudiffusion_1_3`
  - `waifudiffusion_1_4`
parameters.default: epic_diffusion_1_1

parameters.name: strength
parameters.description:
How strongly the original image should be altered (from subtle to drastic changes)
From 0.0 to 1.0

**Constraints:**
- Range: `0 - 1`

parameters.name: guidance
parameters.description:
Adjusts how much the AI tries to fit the prompt (higher = stricter, lower = more freedom).
Higher values means that the AI will try harder to match the text, but extreme values may produce more artifacts.
Lower values means that the AI is allowed more creative freedom in the interpretation of the text.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `-20 - 20`

utterances.utterance: Can you transform this image into a futuristic cityscape at sunset with vibrant colors?

parameters.prompt: futuristic cityscape at sunset with vibrant colors

utterances.utterance: Please enhance this picture of a mountain lake by doubling its resolution while keeping the original style.

parameters.prompt: a serene mountain lake with crystal clear water

utterances.utterance: I'd like to modify this photo of a vintage car with a seed value of 987654321 to get a consistent style.

parameters.prompt: vintage car in a retro style

utterances.utterance: Could you edit this portrait with 120 sampling steps to add more intricate details and textures?

parameters.prompt: portrait of a woman with intricate details and soft lighting

utterances.utterance: Generate a fantasy forest scene from this image using the 'k_lms' sampler for smoother transitions.

parameters.prompt: enchanted fantasy forest with glowing plants

utterances.utterance: Please remove any blurriness or watermarks from this city skyline image while keeping it realistic.

parameters.prompt: realistic city skyline at dusk

utterances.utterance: Use the 'dreamshaper' model to transform this landscape into a dreamy, surreal environment.

parameters.prompt: dreamy surreal landscape with floating islands

utterances.utterance: Alter this image of a classic car with a strength setting of 0.3 for subtle enhancements.

parameters.prompt: classic car with polished chrome and soft reflections

utterances.utterance: Adjust this photo of a snowy mountain with a guidance value of 15 to closely follow the prompt details.

parameters.prompt: snowy mountain peak under a clear blue sky

utterances.utterance: Upscale this image of a tropical beach by 2 and use seed 1234567890 to keep the style consistent.

parameters.prompt: tropical beach with palm trees and turquoise water

api_list.name: /inpainting
api_list.description:
Modify a part of an image (using a mask) to fit a given text description


The following parameters influence the request cost: `init_image`, `steps`, `upscale`
(see the "About" section for more details)

License: CreativeML Open RAIL-M (https://dezgo.com/license.txt)


**Global Constraints:**
- Images must be of the same size: `init_image` and `mask_image`

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description:
Describe how the final image should look like

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: an astronaut riding a horse, digital art, epic lighting, highly-detailed masterpiece trending HQ

parameters.name: mask_image
parameters.description:
A black and white mask that defines the parts of the image to modify.
Should be the same size as init_image.

White pixels = modified ; Black pixels = unchanged

**Constraints:**
- Image size: `8 - 1024` pixels on either side (auto-resized)

constraints.conditional: mask_image, init_image: both images must be of the same size.

parameters.name: init_image
parameters.description:
Upload the original image to be modified.
Supports PNG/JPEG files, up to a maximum of 1024x1024. Dimensions should be divisible by 8. The image is resized automatically if necessary.

**Constraints:**
- Image size: `8 - 1024` pixels on either side (auto-resized)

constraints.conditional: mask_image, init_image: both images must be of the same size.

parameters.name: upscale
parameters.description:
Upscale the image by this factor using the Real-ESRGAN model. Currently only a factor of 2 is supported.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `1 - 2`

parameters.name: negative_prompt
parameters.description:
Describe what you DON'T want in the generated image

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: ugly, tiling, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn feet, poorly drawn face, out of frame, extra limbs, disfigured, deformed, body out of frame, blurry, bad anatomy, blurred, watermark, grainy, signature, cut off, draft

parameters.name: model
parameters.description:
The AI used to generate the image.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `stablediffusion_inpaint_1`
  - `stablediffusion_inpaint_2`
parameters.default: stablediffusion_inpaint_1

parameters.name: steps
parameters.description:
Number of sampling steps. More steps = more details but also longer computation time.
More steps may improve quality under some circumstances and refine details, but it will take longer and be more expensive.
Fewer will result in lower quality images but is quicker and cheaper to process.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `10 - 150`

parameters.name: guidance
parameters.description:
Adjusts how much the AI tries to fit the prompt (higher = stricter, lower = more freedom).
Higher values means that the AI will try harder to match the text, but extreme values may produce more artifacts.
Lower values means that the AI is allowed more creative freedom in the interpretation of the text.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `-20 - 20`

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description:
Unique image seed number. If not provided, the image will be random.
An unsigned 32-bit integer seed used to control the generator randomness.
Reusing the same seed with the same parameters will produce the same image.
Reusing the same seed with slightly different parameters tends to produce variations of the same composition ;
you can use this to experiment with the impact of different parameters.

If you instructed the API to choose a random seed, it can be retrieved from the response header `x-input-seed`

**Constraints:**
- Range: `0 - 4294967295`

parameters.name: sampler
parameters.description:
Defines the sampling method used to generate the image.
The best samplers for low step counts tend to be `dpm`, `euler` and `euler_a`.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `ddim`
  - `dpm`
  - `euler`
  - `euler_a`
  - `k_lms`
  - `pndm`
parameters.default: euler_a

utterances.utterance: Can you modify this image by replacing the masked area with a futuristic cityscape at sunset?

parameters.prompt: futuristic cityscape at sunset, vibrant colors, detailed skyline

utterances.utterance: Please update the masked section of this picture to show a serene mountain lake and upscale the final image by a factor of 2.

parameters.prompt: serene mountain lake with reflections, photorealistic

utterances.utterance: I'd like to change the masked part of this photo to a cozy cabin in the woods, but avoid any fog or haze in the image.

parameters.prompt: cozy cabin in the woods, warm lighting, autumn colors

utterances.utterance: Transform the masked area into a vibrant coral reef scene using the stablediffusion_inpaint_2 model.

parameters.prompt: vibrant coral reef with colorful fish, underwater scene

parameters.prompt: detailed medieval castle on a hill, dramatic lighting

utterances.utterance: Modify the masked portion to depict a bustling city street at night with neon lights, using a guidance value of 15 for strict adherence to the prompt.

parameters.prompt: bustling city street at night, neon lights, rain reflections

utterances.utterance: Change the masked area to a snowy mountain peak and use a seed value of 987654321 to reproduce the same image later.

parameters.prompt: snowy mountain peak under clear blue sky

utterances.utterance: Please update the masked section with a fantasy dragon flying over a volcano, using the dpm sampler for image generation.

parameters.prompt: fantasy dragon flying over erupting volcano, dramatic scene

utterances.utterance: I'd like to replace the masked area with a peaceful beach sunset, upscale the image by 2, and avoid any people or boats in the scene.

parameters.prompt: peaceful beach sunset with vibrant colors

utterances.utterance: Transform the masked part into a futuristic robot cityscape, avoid any blurry or low-quality elements, and use the stablediffusion_inpaint_1 model.

parameters.prompt: futuristic robot cityscape with neon lights

api_list.name: /text2image
api_list.description:
Generate an image from a text description
The result is returned as "image/png".

The following parameters influence the request cost: `width`, `height`, `steps`, `upscale`
(see the "About" section for more details)

License: CreativeML Open RAIL-M (https://dezgo.com/license.txt)


**Global Constraints:**
- Auto resolution: if not provided, fields `width` and `height` are automatically set to the model's native resolution.

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description:
Describe how the final image should look like

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: an astronaut riding a horse, digital art, epic lighting, highly-detailed masterpiece trending HQ

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description:
Unique image seed number. If not provided, the image will be random.
An unsigned 32-bit integer seed used to control the generator randomness.
Reusing the same seed with the same parameters will produce the same image.
Reusing the same seed with slightly different parameters tends to produce variations of the same composition ;
you can use this to experiment with the impact of different parameters.

If you instructed the API to choose a random seed, it can be retrieved from the response header `x-input-seed`

**Constraints:**
- Range: `0 - 4294967295`

parameters.name: guidance
parameters.description:
Adjusts how much the AI tries to fit the prompt (higher = stricter, lower = more freedom).
Higher values means that the AI will try harder to match the text, but extreme values may produce more artifacts.
Lower values means that the AI is allowed more creative freedom in the interpretation of the text.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `-20 - 20`

parameters.name: steps
parameters.description:
Number of sampling steps. More steps = more details but also longer computation time.
More steps may improve quality under some circumstances and refine details, but it will take longer and be more expensive.
Fewer will result in lower quality images but is quicker and cheaper to process.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `10 - 150`

parameters.name: sampler
parameters.description:
Defines the sampling method used to generate the image.
The best samplers for low step counts tend to be `dpm`, `euler` and `euler_a`.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `ddim`
  - `dpm`
  - `euler`
  - `euler_a`
  - `k_lms`
  - `pndm`
parameters.default: euler_a

parameters.name: width
parameters.description:
The image width in pixels.
Must be divisible by 8 (auto-adjusted to the lowest multiple)

**Constraints:**
- Range: `320 - 1024`

parameters.name: upscale
parameters.description:
Upscale the image by this factor using the Real-ESRGAN model. Currently only a factor of 2 is supported.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `1 - 2`

parameters.name: negative_prompt
parameters.description:
Describe what you DON'T want in the generated image

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: ugly, tiling, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn feet, poorly drawn face, out of frame, extra limbs, disfigured, deformed, body out of frame, blurry, bad anatomy, blurred, watermark, grainy, signature, cut off, draft

parameters.name: height
parameters.description:
The image height in pixels.
Must be divisible by 8 (auto-adjusted to the lowest multiple)

**Constraints:**
- Range: `320 - 1024`

parameters.name: model
parameters.description:
The AI used to generate the image.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `abyss_orange_mix_2`
  - `analog_diffusion`
  - `anything_3_0`
  - `anything_4_0`
  - `basil_mix`
  - `blood_orange_mix`
  - `deliberate`
  - `dh_classicanime`
  - `disco_diffusion_style`
  - `double_exposure_diffusion`
  - `dreamshaper`
  - `duchaiten_anime`
  - `duchaiten_darkside`
  - `duchaiten_dreamworld`
  - `eimis_anime_diffusion_1`
  - `ely_orange_mix`
  - `emoji_diffusion`
  - `epic_diffusion_1`
  - `epic_diffusion_1_1`
  - `foto_assisted_diffusion`
  - `future_diffusion`
  - `hasdx`
  - `iconsmi_appiconsmodelforsd`
  - `inkpunk_diffusion`
  - `lowpoly_world`
  - `openjourney`
  - `openjourney_2`
  - `openniji`
  - `paint_journey_2_768px`
  - `papercut`
  - `pastel_mix`
  - `portrait_plus`
  - `realistic_vision_1_3`
  - `redshift_diffusion`
  - `redshift_diffusion_768px`
  - `something_2`
  - `stable_diffusion_fluidart`
  - `stable_diffusion_papercut`
  - `stable_diffusion_voxelart`
  - `stablediffusion_1_4`
  - `stablediffusion_1_5`
  - `stablediffusion_2_0_512px`
  - `stablediffusion_2_0_768px`

utterances.utterance: Can you create an image of a serene mountain lake at sunrise with vibrant colors?

parameters.prompt: a serene mountain lake at sunrise with vibrant colors

utterances.utterance: Generate a futuristic cityscape at night with neon lights, using seed number 987654321 for consistency.

parameters.prompt: futuristic cityscape at night with neon lights

utterances.utterance: I'd like a detailed portrait of a medieval knight, with the AI strictly following the description, guidance set to 15.

parameters.prompt: detailed portrait of a medieval knight

parameters.prompt: fantasy dragon flying over a volcano

parameters.prompt: cyberpunk street scene at dusk

parameters.prompt: cozy cabin in the snowy woods

utterances.utterance: Generate a vibrant underwater coral reef scene and upscale the image by a factor of 2 for better clarity.

parameters.prompt: vibrant underwater coral reef scene

utterances.utterance: I want a portrait of a futuristic robot but exclude any blurry or distorted features from the image.

parameters.prompt: portrait of a futuristic robot
parameters.negative_prompt: blurry, distorted, poorly drawn, out of frame

parameters.prompt: bustling medieval market

parameters.prompt: dreamy landscape with pastel colors

api_list.name: /info
api_list.description: Get information about the Dezgo API (such as available models).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dezgo.p.rapidapi.com/info"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dezgo.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

id.description: Unique identifier of the model (used to specify the model in the API)

name.description: Human readable name of the model

triggers.description:
If set, indicates that the model was trained to react to these specific trigger prompts (for example with Dreambooth finetuning).
Prepend your prompt with one of these triggers to use this model's specific behavior.

functions.description: The set of functions that this model can perform.

description.description: Human readable description of the model

paymentMethods.description: Information about the available payment methods

schema.description: Describe global information about the Dezgo API.

utterances.utterance: Can you tell me what models are available in the Dezgo API?
I want to know the details about the Dezgo API features and supported models.
Please provide information on the different AI models accessible through Dezgo.
What kind of text-to-image and image-to-image models does Dezgo offer?
Could you list the AI models included in the Dezgo platform?
Give me an overview of the Dezgo API capabilities and the models it supports.
I need to find out which Stable Diffusion versions are available via Dezgo.
Tell me about the finetuned models that Dezgo provides access to.
What are the main features and model options in the Dezgo API?
Can you share the list of AI models that Dezgo supports for image generation?

api_list.code:

name.description: Human readable name of the model

triggers.description:
If set, indicates that the model was trained to react to these specific trigger prompts (for example with Dreambooth finetuning).

description.description: Human readable description of the model

Please provide details about the different models supported by the API.

api_list.name: /upscale
api_list.description:
Upscale an image by a factor of 2
This AI attempts to preserve contrasted edges and details as much as possible, producing a sharper image than simple interpolation methods. The result is returned as "image/png".

The following parameters influence the request cost: `image`
(see the "About" section for more details)

parameters.description:
The image to upscale

**Constraints:**
- Image size: `8 - 2048` pixels on either side (auto-resized)

Please upscale this image to twice its original size with clear details preserved.
I need this picture enlarged by a factor of two, making sure the details remain crisp.
Could you double the dimensions of this image and keep the edges well-defined?
Upscale this artwork to twice its size, preserving the contrast and sharpness.
Make this photo twice as large while maintaining the fine details and sharp edges.
Please increase the size of this image by two times, ensuring the image remains sharp.
Can you upscale this image by 2x and keep the edges contrasted and detailed?

parameters.name: strength
parameters.description:
How strongly the original image should be altered (from subtle to drastic changes)
From 0.0 to 1.0

**Constraints:**
- Range: `0 - 1`

parameters.name: guidance
parameters.description:
Adjusts how much the AI tries to fit the prompt (higher = stricter, lower = more freedom).
Higher values means that the AI will try harder to match the text, but extreme values may produce more artifacts.
Lower values means that the AI is allowed more creative freedom in the interpretation of the text.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `-20 - 20`

api_list.name: /inpainting
api_list.description:
Modify a part of an image (using a mask) to fit a given text description


The following parameters influence the request cost: `init_image`, `steps`, `upscale`
(see the "About" section for more details)

License: CreativeML Open RAIL-M (https://dezgo.com/license.txt)


**Global Constraints:**
- Images must be of the same size: `init_image` and `mask_image`

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description:
Describe how the final image should look like

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: an astronaut riding a horse, digital art, epic lighting, highly-detailed masterpiece trending HQ

parameters.name: mask_image
parameters.description:
A black and white mask that defines the parts of the image to modify.
Should be the same size as init_image.

White pixels = modified ; Black pixels = unchanged

**Constraints:**
- Image size: `8 - 1024` pixels on either side (auto-resized)

constraints.conditional: mask_image, init_image: both images must be of the same size.

parameters.name: init_image
parameters.description:
Upload the original image to be modified.
Supports PNG/JPEG files, up to a maximum of 1024x1024. Dimensions should be divisible by 8. The image is resized automatically if necessary.

**Constraints:**
- Image size: `8 - 1024` pixels on either side (auto-resized)

constraints.conditional: mask_image, init_image: both images must be of the same size.

parameters.name: upscale
parameters.description:
Upscale the image by this factor using the Real-ESRGAN model. Currently only a factor of 2 is supported.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `1 - 2`

parameters.name: negative_prompt
parameters.description:
Describe what you DON'T want in the generated image

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: ugly, tiling, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn feet, poorly drawn face, out of frame, extra limbs, disfigured, deformed, body out of frame, blurry, bad anatomy, blurred, watermark, grainy, signature, cut off, draft

parameters.name: model
parameters.description:
The AI used to generate the image.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `stablediffusion_inpaint_1`
  - `stablediffusion_inpaint_2`
parameters.default: stablediffusion_inpaint_1

parameters.name: steps
parameters.description:
Number of sampling steps. More steps = more details but also longer computation time.
More steps may improve quality under some circumstances and refine details, but it will take longer and be more expensive.
Fewer will result in lower quality images but is quicker and cheaper to process.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `10 - 150`

parameters.name: guidance
parameters.description:
Adjusts how much the AI tries to fit the prompt (higher = stricter, lower = more freedom).
Higher values means that the AI will try harder to match the text, but extreme values may produce more artifacts.
Lower values means that the AI is allowed more creative freedom in the interpretation of the text.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `-20 - 20`

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description:
Unique image seed number. If not provided, the image will be random.
An unsigned 32-bit integer seed used to control the generator randomness.
Reusing the same seed with the same parameters will produce the same image.
Reusing the same seed with slightly different parameters tends to produce variations of the same composition ;
you can use this to experiment with the impact of different parameters.

If you instructed the API to choose a random seed, it can be retrieved from the response header `x-input-seed`

**Constraints:**
- Range: `0 - 4294967295`

parameters.name: sampler
parameters.description:
Defines the sampling method used to generate the image.
The best samplers for low step counts tend to be `dpm`, `euler` and `euler_a`.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `ddim`
  - `dpm`
  - `euler`
  - `euler_a`
  - `k_lms`
  - `pndm`
parameters.default: euler_a

utterances.utterance: Can you modify this image by replacing the masked area with a futuristic cityscape at sunset?

parameters.prompt: futuristic cityscape at sunset, vibrant colors, detailed skyline

utterances.utterance: Please update the masked section of this picture with a serene mountain lake and upscale the final image by a factor of 2.

parameters.prompt: serene mountain lake with reflections, photorealistic

utterances.utterance: I'd like to change the masked part of this photo to a cozy cabin in the woods, but avoid any fog or haze in the image.

parameters.prompt: cozy cabin in the woods, warm lighting, autumn colors

utterances.utterance: Transform the masked area into a vibrant coral reef scene using the stablediffusion_inpaint_2 model.

parameters.prompt: vibrant coral reef with colorful fish, underwater scene

utterances.utterance: Replace the masked region with a bustling medieval market scene, and use 50 steps for more detail.

parameters.prompt: bustling medieval market, lively crowd, detailed stalls

utterances.utterance: Modify the masked portion to show a futuristic robot but keep the guidance level at 10 for a balanced interpretation.

parameters.prompt: futuristic robot with sleek design, metallic textures

utterances.utterance: Change the masked area to a vintage car parked on a street, and use seed number 987654321 to reproduce the same style.

parameters.prompt: vintage car on a cobblestone street, warm lighting

utterances.utterance: Please update the masked section with a fantasy dragon flying over mountains, using the k_lms sampler for generation.

parameters.prompt: fantasy dragon soaring over snowy mountains, epic scene

utterances.utterance: Replace the masked area with a peaceful Japanese garden, upscale the image by 2, and exclude any people or animals.

parameters.prompt: peaceful Japanese garden with cherry blossoms and stone lanterns

utterances.utterance: Modify the masked part to depict a sci-fi cityscape at night, avoid blurry or low-quality elements, and use the stablediffusion_inpaint_1 model.

parameters.prompt: sci-fi cityscape at night with neon lights, high detail

api_list.name: /text2image
api_list.description:
Generate an image from a text description
The result is returned as "image/png".

The following parameters influence the request cost: `width`, `height`, `steps`, `upscale`
(see the "About" section for more details)

License: CreativeML Open RAIL-M (https://dezgo.com/license.txt)


**Global Constraints:**
- Auto resolution: if not provided, fields `width` and `height` are automatically set to the model's native resolution.

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description:
Describe how the final image should look like

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: an astronaut riding a horse, digital art, epic lighting, highly-detailed masterpiece trending HQ

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description:
Unique image seed number. If not provided, the image will be random.
An unsigned 32-bit integer seed used to control the generator randomness.
Reusing the same seed with the same parameters will produce the same image.
Reusing the same seed with slightly different parameters tends to produce variations of the same composition ;
you can use this to experiment with the impact of different parameters.

If you instructed the API to choose a random seed, it can be retrieved from the response header `x-input-seed`

**Constraints:**
- Range: `0 - 4294967295`

parameters.name: guidance
parameters.description:
Adjusts how much the AI tries to fit the prompt (higher = stricter, lower = more freedom).
Higher values means that the AI will try harder to match the text, but extreme values may produce more artifacts.
Lower values means that the AI is allowed more creative freedom in the interpretation of the text.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `-20 - 20`

parameters.name: steps
parameters.description:
Number of sampling steps. More steps = more details but also longer computation time.
More steps may improve quality under some circumstances and refine details, but it will take longer and be more expensive.
Fewer will result in lower quality images but is quicker and cheaper to process.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `10 - 150`

parameters.name: sampler
parameters.description:
Defines the sampling method used to generate the image.
The best samplers for low step counts tend to be `dpm`, `euler` and `euler_a`.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `ddim`
  - `dpm`
  - `euler`
  - `euler_a`
  - `k_lms`
  - `pndm`
parameters.default: euler_a

parameters.name: width
parameters.description:
The image width in pixels.
Must be divisible by 8 (auto-adjusted to the lowest multiple)

**Constraints:**
- Range: `320 - 1024`

parameters.name: upscale
parameters.description:
Upscale the image by this factor using the Real-ESRGAN model. Currently only a factor of 2 is supported.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `1 - 2`

parameters.name: negative_prompt
parameters.description:
Describe what you DON'T want in the generated image

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: ugly, tiling, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn feet, poorly drawn face, out of frame, extra limbs, disfigured, deformed, body out of frame, blurry, bad anatomy, blurred, watermark, grainy, signature, cut off, draft

parameters.name: height
parameters.description:
The image height in pixels.
Must be divisible by 8 (auto-adjusted to the lowest multiple)

**Constraints:**
- Range: `320 - 1024`

parameters.name: model
parameters.description:
The AI used to generate the image.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `abyss_orange_mix_2`
  - `analog_diffusion`
  - `anything_3_0`
  - `anything_4_0`
  - `basil_mix`
